Serialized Form

  • Package ser321.movie

    • Class ser321.movie.MovieLibraryGui extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • dim

          java.awt.Dimension dim

        • useStd

          java.awt.Font useStd

        • useEntry

          java.awt.Font useEntry

        • displaySplitPane

          javax.swing.JSplitPane displaySplitPane

        • scene

          javafx.scene.Scene scene

        • player

          javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer player

        • tree

          javax.swing.JTree tree
          tree is the javax.swing.JTree displayed in the left pane of the window.

        • menuNames

          java.lang.String[] menuNames
          String array of menu names The array's value is: {"File","Movie"}

        • fileMenuNames

          java.lang.String[] fileMenuNames
          Array of strings naming the action commands for File menu. The array's value is: {"Save","Restore","Tree Refresh","Exit"}.

        • movieMenuNames

          java.lang.String[] movieMenuNames
          Array of strings naming the action commands for Movie menu. The array's value is: {"Add","Remove","Play"}.

        • userMenuItems

          javax.swing.JMenuItem[][] userMenuItems
          The menu items. Each entry in the array is a javax.swing.JMenuItem. userMenuItems is an array of arrays. Each sub array contains the JMenuItem objects for the respective menus (File and Movie). Note the order in this array matches the order in the menuNames arrays.

        • menuItemNames

          java.lang.String[][] menuItemNames
          The menu item names. menuItemNames is an array of arrays. Note the order in this array matches the order in menu names array.

        • mnemonics

          int[][] mnemonics

        • titleJTF

          javax.swing.JTextField titleJTF
          The javax.swing.JTextField for entering the title of the movie.

        • omdbSearchButt

          javax.swing.JButton omdbSearchButt
          The javax.swing.JButton for initiating an open movie database search for title.

        • ratedJTF

          javax.swing.JTextField ratedJTF
          The javax.swing.JTextField for displaying and entering the movie rating.

        • runtimeJTF

          javax.swing.JTextField runtimeJTF
          The javax.swing.JTextField for displaying and entering the movie runtime.

        • releasedJTF

          javax.swing.JTextField releasedJTF
          The javax.swing.JTextField for displaying and entering the movie release date.

        • fileNameJTF

          javax.swing.JTextField fileNameJTF
          The javax.swing.JTextField for entering the movie file name.

        • plotJTA

          javax.swing.JTextArea plotJTA
          The javax.swing.JTextArea for displaying and entering the movie plot.

        • actorsJCB

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> actorsJCB
          The javax.swing.JComboBox for displaying and entering actors

        • actorsClearButton

          javax.swing.JButton actorsClearButton
          The javax.swing.JButton for clearning the actors combobox

        • genreJCB

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> genreJCB
          The javax.swing.JComboBox for displaying and entering genre

        • genreClearButton

          javax.swing.JButton genreClearButton
          The javax.swing.JButton for clearning the actors combobox
